recipes.name: Pancake
recipes.title: How to Make Delicious Pancake | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter; mix until smooth. Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot.

comments.comment: Wow! I recieved my order within 20 min!
comments.author: Veena

recipes.name: Soupe
recipes.title: How to Make Perfect Soupe | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: Cut the pumpkin into 3cm / 2.25 slices. Cut the skin off and scrape seeds out (video is helpful). Cut into 4cm / 1.5 chunks. Place the pumpkin, onion, garlic, broth and water in a pot - liquid won't quite cover all the pumpkin. Bring to a boil, uncovered, then reduce heat and let simmer rapidly until pumpkin is tender (check with butter knife) - about 10 minutes. Remove from heat and use a stick blender to blend until smooth (Note 3 for blender). Season to taste with salt and pepper, stir through cream (never boil soup after adding soup, cream will split).  Ladle soup into bowls, drizzle over a bit of cream, sprinkle with pepper and parsley if desired. Serve with crusty bread!

recipes.name: Eierspätzle
recipes.title: How to Make Delicious Eierspätzle | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: Pluck the leaves from the basil and roughly chop. Halve the cherry tomatoes. Roughly chop the sun-dried tomatoes. Make a broth from the vegetable stock and 50ml [100ml] of hot water. Cut the mozzarella into approx. 1 cm cubes. Cut the courgettes lengthways into strips using a vegetable peeler. In a large frying pan, toast the pine nuts over a medium heat for 2 – 3 minutes without adding any fat, until fragrant. Then take it out of the pan and let it cool down a bit.Heat 1 teaspoon [1 tablespoon] oil in the same pan, fry the egg spaetzle in it for 3 – 6 minutes, turning until golden brown. Then deglaze with vegetable broth. Add the cherry tomato halves and let simmer for 3 – 4 minutes. Fold in ½ of the chopped basil, chopped sun-dried tomatoes, and zucchini strips. Season with salt and pepper. Put the lid on and continue to cook the spaetzle pan over a low heat for approx. 3 minutes. Arrange the spaetzle on plates, garnish with roasted pine nuts, diced mozzarella and the remaining basil and enjoy. Enjoy your meal!

recipes.name: Momo's
recipes.title: How to Make Delicious Momo's | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: firstly, prepare stuffing by heating 3 tsp oil and saute 3 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 2 chilli. also, add 2 tbsp spring onion and saute on high flame.further, add 1 cup carrot and 2 cup cabbage. stir fry on high flame.now add ½ tsp pepper and ½ tsp salt. additionally, 2 tbsp spring onion and stuffing mixture is ready. further, pinch a small ball sized momos dough and flatten. now dust with some maida and start to roll using a rolling pin. roll to almost medium thin circle. around 4 – 5 inch in diameter. make sure you roll from sides and keep the centre slightly thick. now place a heaped tbsp of prepared stuffing in the centre. start pleating the edges slowly and gather everything. press in middle and seal the momos forming a bundle. heat a steamer and arrange the momos in the tray without touching each other. furthermore, steam momos for 10-12 minutes or till shiny sheen appears over it. finally, veg momos recipe is ready to enjoy with momos chutney.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
recipes.title: How to Make Perfect Garlic Bread | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: Heat 1/2 cup of the broth in a pot until simmering, add saffron and set aside for 10 minutes. Heat oil in a (14- to 16-inch)paella pan or a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat. Addchicken, shrimp and chorizo, and cook, stirring occasionally untillightly browned, 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer shrimp to a large plateand set aside, leaving chicken and chorizo in the pan. Addpimentón, bay leaves, garlic, tomatoes, onion, salt and pepper,and cook, stirring often until thickened and fragrant, about 10minutes. Add saffron broth and remaining 4 1/2 cups chicken broth;bring to a boil. Add rice and stir very gently to distribute. Topwith artichokes and peppers, and cook without stirring, until mostof the liquid is absorbed, 15 to 18 minutes. Reduce heat tomedium-low, add reserved shrimp and mussels, tucking them downinto the rice, and cook again without stirring, until mussels haveopened and rice is just tender, 5 to 7 minutes more. (Discard anymussels that don’t open.) Set aside off of the heat to let restfor 10 minutes, and then serve.

recipes.name: Sandwich
recipes.title: How to Make Perfect Sandwitch | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: Whip the ingredients for the scallion cream cheese together in a small bowl (I used a fork).Lightly toast the bread. Spread the cream cheese over one side of each pieces of bread. Pile the vegetables onto the bread, then close. Slice in half and enjoy.

recipes.name: Pasta
recipes.title: How to Make Perfect Pasta | Gennaro Contaldo
recipes.method: Bring a pan of water to the boil and season it with salt. Add the spaghetti and stir it gently until all the strands sink beneath the water level. Stir again to make sure they're not stuck together. Cook following the pack instructions but taking 2 mins off the time suggested. Check the pasta when the time is up by biting into a strand – it should be cooked through but still firm. Cook for a further 1-2 mins if you need to, or if you prefer your spaghetti softer. Drain, reserving a little pasta water to add to the sauce. Add the pasta to the sauce straight away so it doesn’t stick together as it cools.
